subject: Welcome to DentalTap
welcome: Hello, %fullname%. Thanks for signing up for DentalTap.
descr: We are a team of experts in dentistry and technology. Being funded several times by tech investors, we are working with dentists from all over the world to bring them the most efficient and easy to use technology in their everyday working life.
descr1: We are fully specialized in dental practices, which means our services include everything a fully operational dental practice needs to run smoothly and with efficiency in order to make the business grow.
descr2: Our main goal is proivde a pleasant experience of appointments for your patients and help your dental business grow.
